item.description:
Sorry to change the time! I just realized that the automatically scheduled date was on labor day weekend and I'll be out of town. If people would prefer to meet on the 6th, that's fine though.

This meet up will simultaneously serve to introduce local Scrabble players to each other as well as allow us to get a few games in. Bring your boards or just bring yourself!

At the last meetup we had 3 boards and six players, so it worked out perfectly. In a little less than 2 hours we played two games each. I will bring 1 board with me and a dictionary, more are welcome.

We can also talk a little more about whether to keep the group on Meetup or move it to a different web site. New folks especially are welcome!
item.how_to_find_us: Au Bon Pain is pretty empty on Sundays--you will have no trouble spotting the Scrabble boards. Some folks may wander in late so don't leave if it looks empty at first.
item.name: Scrabble Enthusiasts of Boston September Meetup-Davis Square (moved to 9/13)
